speaker: President.
english: President. – The next item is the debate on the report ( A6-0365/2006 ) by Mr Herrero-Tejedor, on behalf of the Committee on Culture and Education, on the White Paper on a European communication policy ( 2006/2087(INI) ).
original: President. – The next item is the debate on the report ( A6-0365/2006 ) by Mr Herrero-Tejedor, on behalf of the Committee on Culture and Education, on the White Paper on a European communication policy ( 2006/2087(INI) ).
